text: Flotsam and jetsam is refuse found in the ocean. Flotsam and Jetsam may also refer to: == Television == * "Flotsam and Jetsam" (Being Human), an episode of Being Human * "Flotsam and Jetsam", an episode of QI == Books == * "Flotsam and Jetsam", a chapter of The Two Towers by J. R. R. Tolkien * "Flotsam and Jetsam", a short story by W. Somerset Maugham == Fictional characters == * Flotsam and Jetsam (The Little Mermaid), two characters in The Little Mermaid * Flotsam and Jetsam, two police officers in the Hollywood Station series by Joseph Wambaugh == Music == * Flotsam and Jetsam (band), a thrash metal band from Phoenix, Arizona ** Flotsam and Jetsam (Flotsam and Jetsam album), 2016 * Flotsam and Jetsam (EP), a 2006 EP by Mystery Jets * "Flotsam and Jetsam", a song by Peter Gabriel from eponymous second album * Flotsam and Jetsam (Peter Gabriel album), 2019 compilation album ==See also== * Flotsam (disambiguation) * Flotsam Jetsam, a compilation album by Robert Wyatt * Jetsam (disambiguation) * Mr. Flotsam and Mr. Jetsam, an Anglo-Australian musical comedy duo of the 1920s and 1930s
title: Flotsam and Jetsam (disambiguation)
